abstract: McDonald's is tweaking its burger-making methods in hopes of reinvigorating customer interest.
lead_paragraph: McDonald’s said it would toast its hamburger buns longer and change the way it grills its beef.

headline.main: McDonald’s Will Change How Its Burgers Are Cooked
headline.print_headline: McDonald’s Will Change How Its Burgers Are Cooked

snippet: McDonald’s said it would toast its hamburger buns longer and change the way it grills its beef.
